alert.note: Alert for Del Norte Interior (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued December 06 at 2:18PM PST until December 07 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WATCH FOR THE SMITH RIVER COMPLEX BURN SCAR IS CANCELLED... The Flash Flood Watch for the Smith River Complex burn scar is cancelled for a portion of northwest California, including the following area, Del Norte Interior. Flash Flooding and debris flow is no longer expected to pose a threat. Rain will continue overnight through early tomorrow. && ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of northwest California, including the following area, Del Norte Interior. * WHEN...Until 2 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Low-water crossings may be flooded. Increased risk of rock and mudslides on roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - 1.0 to 1.5 inches of rain have already fallen. An additional 1 to 2.0 inches of of rain are expected through tonight. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
